label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_024
content:
## 2026-01-25 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /sso_sessions: REQUESTS 111540 req | p50: 42.5ms p95:  | p99:  | err: 0.46% (517 errors) | success: 99.54%
- /mfa_enrollment: REQUESTS 228 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success: 91.9%
- /authn_failures: REQUESTS 1046 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | invalid_password: 1046 | mfa_challenge_failed: 279 | account_locked: 66
- /token_ops: REQUESTS 186920 req | p50: 168ms p95:  | p99:  | err: 0.0059% (11 failures) | success: 99.9941% | access_tokens: 186920 | refresh_tokens: 46980 | token_rotations: 10280
- /privileged_access: REQUESTS 384 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | admin_logins: 384 | break_glass: 0 | privileged_session_avg: 17.2min | sudo_requests: 87
- /rbac_changes: REQUESTS 2 + 121 + 120 + 41 req | p50: 36min (policy_updates: 2 | role_grants: 121 | role_revokes: 120 | permission_change_requests: 41) | err:  | success:  | avg_approval_time: 36min
- /audit_pipeline: REQUESTS 1619400 req | p50:  | p95: 5.8s | p99:  | err:  | success:  | events_ingested: 1619400 | events_dropped: 92 | queue_depth_peak: 3010

- /idp_health: REQUESTS 0 + 10 + 0 + 2 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | oidc_discovery_errors: 0 | saml_assertion_errors: 10 | jwks_fetch_errors: 0 | metadata_refreshes: 2
- /helpdesk: REQUESTS 212 req | p50: 12min | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | access_requests: 212 | password_resets: 140 | mfa_resets: 27 | median_first_response: 12min
- /rate_limits: REQUESTS 25 + 6 + 0 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | login_rate_limited: 25 | token_endpoint_rate_limited: 6 | api_keys_throttled: 0
- /session_security: REQUESTS 37 + 4 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | forced_reauth_events: 37 | anomalous_device_blocks: 4 | remembered_device_count: 31810
- /evidence_exports: REQUESTS 9 + 3 req | p50:  | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | csv_exports: 9 | pdf_exports: 3 | export_failures: 0
- /admin_approvals: REQUESTS 28 + 4 + 3 req | p50: 35min | p95:  | p99:  | err:  | success:  | pending_requests: 28 | auto_approved: 4 | rejected: 3

### Infrastructure
- idp-api-01: CPU 42% | Mem 66% | Disk 65% | Conns: 74 | Net: 74/79 Mbps
- idp-api-02: CPU 40% | Mem 65% | Disk 63% | Conns: 72 | Net: 72/77 Mbps
- audit-worker-01: CPU 51% | Mem 54% | Disk 48% | Conns: 109 | Net: 109/104 Mbps
- audit-db-01: CPU 30% | Mem 74% | Disk 77% | IOPS: 8100 | Replication lag: 0.4 sec

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active N | idle N | waiting N | exhaustion: N | max: N | avg_wait: Xms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: X% | Bandwidth: X Gbps | Origin requests: N

### Alerts
- [SEVERITY] saml_assertion_errors on idp-health: 10

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments or changes reported today.

### Events
- Closed one of two open exceptions after owner provided missing ticket linkage; attached evidence and updated control log.
- Reviewed upcoming auditor walkthrough agenda; staged screenshots of MFA policy, RBAC approval workflow, and break-glass controls.
- Investigated minor token rotation failures; confirmed 11 were due to client clock skew causing early expiry; notified owners.
- Validated directory sync deletion list against HR; all 7 deletions matched terminations.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: A. Novak. 0 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Stable; exceptions reduced and walkthrough prep completed.
